feed.title: Sri Govindaji Gaudiya Matha
feed.subtitle: Gaudiya Vaishnava Temple located in North-West Houston. It is established under the spiritual guidance of Sri Srimad Bhaktivedanta Narayana Goswami Maharaja.

entry.title: Janmastami Invitation Video
entry.content: Sri Krishna Janmashtami invitation for Aug 26th 2024. Everyone is welcome to share, and join this divine event.
entry.summary: Sri Krishna Janmashtami invitation for Aug 26th 2024

entry.title: Three Big Celebrations
entry.content:
üåπAll glories to Shri Shri Guru and Gauranga. All glories to Shri Shri Radha Govindji.üåπ

Hare Krishna. üôè

‚ú®THREE BIG CELEBRATIONS:‚ú®

SRI GOVINDJI GAUDIYA MATH IS CELEBRATING THREE most glorious and auspicious
festivals of the year:

üå∑1. SRI KRISHNA JANMASHTAMI

MONDAY, August 26
7pm to Midnight üå∑

On this day we celebrate the advent of Lord Sri Krishna on this earth around 5000 years ago. We will have ecstatic Kirtan, abhishek, Janam-lila Katha and Midnight Maha Arati.

This is a very auspicious, exciting and entertaining event for the whole family, so please come and take blessings from the merciful Lord and participate in the celebration!

You will have the opportunity to perform pooja with your own thalis.

TO sponsor pooja thali or for festivals Sponsorship OR TO GET MORE INFORMATION, PLEASE CALL 832-464-4686 AND CHECK OUR WEBSITE SGGM.ORG.

Please be a part of these celebrations and be rewarded by spreading this message further and further.

üåº 2. NAND UTSAV
SUNDAY, September 1
11am to 1pm
FOLLOWED BY MAHAPRASAD. üåº

‚ù§Ô∏è 3. SHRI RADHASHTAMI
DIVINE APPEARANCE DAY OF SHRI RADHARANI
WEDNESDAY, September 11
6:30pm to 8:30pm‚ù§Ô∏è

FOLLOWED BY MAHA PRASAD.

Thanks.
Haribol.üôè
entry.summary: Janmastami - Aug 26 • Nandostav - Sep 1 • Radhastami - Sep 11

entry.title: Sri Jhulan Yatra and Baladev Purnima

link.title: Sri Jhulan Yatra and Baladev Purnima

entry.title: Sri Guru Purnima
entry.content:
All Glories to Shri shri Guru and Gauranga. All Glories to Shri shri RadhaGovindaji.

Hare Krishna.

Shri Govindaji Gaudiya math invite all of you to celebrate SHRI GURU PURNIMA - VYAS PUJA FESTIVAL ON SUNDAY JULY 21 from 11am to 1pm. This is the day people worship their Guru all over India and all over the world.

Haribol.

entry.title: Annual Festival
entry.content:
ALL GLORIES TO SHRI SHRI GURU AND GAURANGA. ALL GLORIES TO SHRI SHRI RADHA GOVINDAJI.

SRI GOVINDJI GAUDIYA MATH IS CELEBRATING the MOST Glorious and Auspicious Festival of the 11th Anniversary (Praktya Divas) of our temple opening and Deity installation on Sunday July 14th from 9 am to 1pm.

There will be a Vaishnava havan at 9 am, which you all can participate in, then Kirtan, harikatha and Maha Aarti followed by Lunch Prasadam.
This is a very auspicious event for the whole family, so please PARTICIPATE and take the blessings from the Lordships.

TO SPONSORSHIP OR TO GET MORE INFORMATION, PLEASE CALL 832-464-4686 AND CHECK OUR WEBSITE SGGM.ORG

PLEASE INVITE EVERYONE BY FORWARDING THIS MESSAGE TO YOUR GROUP CHATS, FB page and everywhere.

THANKS HARIBOL
entry.summary: SGGM 11th Anniversary on Sunday July 14th from 9 am to 1pm

entry.title: Sri Narasimha Caturdasi
entry.content:
All Glories to Shri shri Guru and Gauranga. All Glories to Shri shri RadhaGovindaji.

Hare Krishna.

Please join in the celebration of Lord Narasingha Dev‚Äôs appearance day. Lord Narasingha Dev is the Remover of all the obstacles of our life.

Haribol.

entry.title: Sri Akshay Tritiya & Chandan Yatra
entry.content:
All Glories to Shri shri Guru and Gauranga. All Glories to Shri shri Radha Govindaji.

Hare Krishna. Please join to celebrate - AKSHAY TRITIYA AND CHANDAN YATRA festival. This is very auspicious tithi. Any spiritual activity Or seva performed on this day never gets destroyed. NOT TO BE MISSED.

Haribol.

entry.title: Sri Ram Katha
entry.content:
Hare Krishna. We request you to bring your RAMAYAN BOOK to participate in reading RAM JANAM LEELA .

Thanks Haribol.

entry.title: Virtual Sri Navadvip Parikrama and Sri Gaura Purnima

link.title: Virtual Sri Navadvip Parikrama and Sri Gaura Purnima

entry.content:
All Glories to Shri shri Guru and Gauranga. All Glories to Shri shri RadhaGovindaji.

Hare Krishna. Virtual Navdweep Dham parikrama. March 18 thru March 23. 6:30 to 9pm followed by Maha Prasad.

Parikrama will conclude with the celebration of GAUR PURNIMA FESTIVAL on March 24 Sunday from 5pm to 7:30pm. Haribol.
